```{r, setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(fs)
library(tidycensus)
library(lehdr)
library(sf)
library(readxl)
data_dir <- "C:/Users/Jennah/Desktop/Code/RMproject"
```

```{r}
merged_oz <- readRDS("../2_output/analysis_file.RDS") %>% 
  mutate(across(C000rac:CS02wac, ~if_else(is.na(.), 0, .)))
```


```{r}
mod1 <- lm(C000rac ~ year_fact + year_fact:treatment + treatment, data = merged_oz)
summary(mod1)

mod2 <- lm(C000wac ~ year_fact + year_fact:treatment + treatment, data = merged_oz)
summary(mod2)

mod3 <- lm(S000_same_tract ~ year_fact + post:treatment + treatment, data = merged_oz %>% 
             filter(year %in% c(2016, 2019) & LIC == TRUE))
summary(mod3)

merged_oz %>% 
  filter(LIC == TRUE) %>% 
  group_by(DESIGNATED) %>% 
  summarize(n = n())
```
